name: cognito-auth-package
description: Comprehensive authentication package for AWS Cognito with Lambda handlers and CloudFormation infrastructure

scripts.package: npm run build && npm run package:handlers && npm run package:layer
scripts.package:handlers: cd dist/handlers && for f in *.js; do zip "${f%.js}.zip" "$f" "../class/*.js" "../utils/*.js"; done
scripts.package:layer: mkdir -p layer/nodejs && cp -r node_modules layer/nodejs/ && cd layer && zip -r ../node-dependencies.zip .
scripts.deploy: npm run package && aws cloudformation deploy --template-file ../../infrastructure/auth-stack.yaml --stack-name cognito-auth-stack --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM
